name: Mondo Megabits
description:
FREE FOR ALL MONDO MEGABIT NFT HOLDERS!

[[ Visit https://www.mondomegabits.com/claim and claim your FREE DOWNLOAD KEY. ]]

The official [[ MONDO MEGABITS CCG GAME ]]. Build a deck and play with friends or challenge strangers!

With [[ 1v1 MULTIPLAYER BATTLES ]] you'll have endless hours of free-play and sandbox matchmaking to perfect your strategy and battle it out with other Puppet Masters.

But that's not all - our [[ DECK BUILDER ]] feature allows you to experiment with all cards to create the ultimate deck. Upload and share your decks with the community of Puppet Masters and rate their decks to see who reigns supreme.

And don't worry if you're new to the game - our [[ TUTORIALS ]] will teach you everything you need to know about the game mechanics and keep you up to date with the latest changes to the rule set as the game progresses.

We're committed to [[ COMMUNITY-DRIVEN DEVELOPMENT ]], so you can give feedback and suggestions in-game to help shape the future of the game. And best of all, we're offering free updates as we develop the game, so you'll always have something new to look forward to.

Don't miss out on this opportunity to join the battle and become a true [[ PUPPET MASTER ]]!!!
